name: BattleFlows
description:
BattleFlows is a prototype for a multiplayer strategy game.  Create troop flows to conquer scoring areas and gain points to win the round, battle opponents for territory and use the terrain to your advantage.

  • Play a short introduction to test the core features of the game
  • Join the multiplayer lobby for a small 1vs1 testing map.

This is an early prototype. So please, play it and tell us what you think.
